name: part_000
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】#アキロゼ生誕祭2026 ーLife is GAMEー【ホロライブ⧸アキ・ローゼンタール】 [_tBlI-l8WLk]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Intro sequence with title card 'Life is GAME 2026' and instrumental jazz music. AkiRose is sitting on the logo.
Animated board game sequence. Chibi AkiRose encounters a branching path and panics about which way to go.
AkiRose appears on stage in a black dress to perform.

subtitles.original: 右に進むか... 左の道なら...
subtitles.english: Should I go right... If I take the left path...

subtitles.original: 解は？ チャンスか？
subtitles.english: What's the answer? Is it a chance?

subtitles.original: リスクがでかい リスクが小さい
subtitles.english: Huge risk... Small risk...

subtitles.original: やっぱり右？ いや左か... どうする
subtitles.english: Right after all? No, left...? What do I do?!

subtitles.original: 人を過度に信じないように
subtitles.english: Try not to trust people too much.

subtitles.original: 愛さないように
subtitles.english: Try not to love too much.

subtitles.original: 期待しないように
subtitles.english: Try not to expect too much.

subtitles.original: かと言って角が立たないように
subtitles.english: But try not to make waves either.

subtitles.original: 気取らぬように
subtitles.english: Try not to act stuck-up.

subtitles.original: 目立たぬように
subtitles.english: Try not to stand out.

subtitles.original: 誰一人傷つけぬように
subtitles.english: Try not to hurt a single person.

subtitles.original: 虐めぬように
subtitles.english: Try not to bully anyone.

subtitles.original: 殺さぬように
subtitles.english: Try not to kill anyone.

subtitles.original: かと言って偽善がバレないように
subtitles.english: But try not to let your hypocrisy show.

subtitles.original: 威張らないように
subtitles.english: Try not to be arrogant.

subtitles.original: 軽いジョークやリップサービスも忘れぬように
subtitles.english: Try not to forget light jokes and lip service.

subtitles.original: どんな時も笑って愛嬌振り撒くように
subtitles.english: Smile and sprinkle charm everywhere, no matter the time.

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: Bitter Choco Decoration.

subtitles.original: 兎角言わずにちゃんと召し上がれ
subtitles.english: Just eat it up properly without complaining.

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: Bitter Choco Decoration.

subtitles.original: 食わず嫌いはちゃんと直さなきゃ
subtitles.english: You have to fix your pickiness properly.

subtitles.original: 頭空っぽその後に
subtitles.english: Empty your head, and after that...

subtitles.original: 残る心が本物なら
subtitles.english: If the heart that remains is real...

subtitles.original: きっと君だって同じ事
subtitles.english: Surely, you're just the same.

subtitles.original: 「そこで一つ、ここいらで一つ」
subtitles.english: "So here's one, and here's another."
